Political relations between Germany and Azerbaijan are developing successfully and have a positive impact on all other areas.
The Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict is a great threat to both Azerbaijan and the region.
This conflict should be resolved on the basis of the norms and principles of international law, and there should be a single approach as all other conflicts.
We recognize the territorial integrity of all countries. We believe that it is the fundamental principle of international law.

May Allah have mercy on him, a merciful king and an authentic Arab who dedicated his life to serve the Arab and Islamic nation. Mtrahh Paradise, God willing. God extended the age of his brethren, His Majesty and King Salman
Territorial integrity can not be changed without the consent of countries.
Energy security is the main topic of talks between Europe and Azerbaijan.
Projects proposed by Azerbaijan change the European energy map.
Azerbaijan is the fastest growing country in the world in the last 11 years.
All freedoms are provided in Azerbaijan. There are hundreds of media outlets in the country, the internet is free, and there is no censorship.
In Azerbaijan, according to criticism, no one is persecuted for the idea, no one is arrested.
Different political groups in Azerbaijan regularly hold rallies, no restrictions are imposed.
I am convinced that political reforms should be carried out in parallel with economic reforms.
But in this case, countries can achieve a sustainable ending.
Azerbaijan has been a member of the Council of Europe since 2001 and fulfills all its commitments to the Council of Europe in time and with honor.
Representatives of all religions, all ethnic groups in Azerbaijan live as one family, there is no conflict or disagreement.
The values ​​of multiculturalism in Azerbaijan are protected at a very high level and in this respect, Azerbaijan's experience is studied in other countries.
A modern state is established in Azerbaijan. We live in the 24th year of our independence.
I think that during these years Azerbaijan has already proved itself as a reliable and respected country in the international arena.
